creator: tigerface@gmx.de
text:
i tried to preload svg files with jsvgcomponents. if the component is added to a
panel AFTER the loading finished, jsvgcomponent does not start painting at upper
left position. it looks like the center of the image is at the lower right
corner of the jsvgcomponent.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
You need to set the width and height of the component 
before loading SVG document so it knows how to scale
image for display.
